name: Pteranodon
description:
"Stranded upon the nest of the mighty pteranodon, you must now defend yourself using nothing but makeshift spears made from the remnants of the pterosaurs prey."



Pteranodon is a prehistoric hardcore endless arena FPS. There is no escape from the Pteranodon and your spears will only deter the beast....it can not be killed. Players must prove their skills as they compete to be the best on the leaderboard

How many spears can you manage to throw into the scales of this mighty pterosaur?





Game Details
  • FPS
  • Singleplayer
  • Game Loop: 15 min
  • One Arena Map
  • Achievements
  • Leaderboard
